h4.a: Larkin Road and Town Beach Parking Passes

li.div: Larkin road and Town Beach parking passes for the 2020 season will be mail in only until further notice. Please allow 2 weeks to receive pass. They are available beginning 4/24/20. Read on...

h4.a: Guidance for the wearing of cloth face coverings at work

li.div: Governor Raimondo’s Executive Order 20-14 prohibited all gatherings of more than 5 people and all non-critical, retail businesses from conducting in-person operations. However, critical businesses remain open and some of their employees must Read on...

The Town of Westerly is receiving 300 pre-packaged meals on Friday from the University of Rhode Island for the region to include Westerly, Richmond, Charlestown, Hopkinton, and Exeter. Read on...

h4.a: COVID-19 Testing Expanded to All Symptomatic Rhode Islanders
